Santini Romeo Flip Flops Price: Rs.239

Look your best when you go for your routine strolls or quick trips to the nearby store with this pair of Romeo flip flops from Santini. Its rubber sole material allows for a comfortable walk while they flaunt a stylish appearance with its grey and red coloured body. Team it cargo shorts or black shorts for the ultimate in casual attire.

Providing a careful but appealing mix of trendiness to a casual array of simple and modestly designed slippers and flip flops
